name: Sweet Potato Mini Peppers Spinach Alfredo Bake
description: This Vegan Sweet Potato & Mini Pepper Alfredo Bake features a creamy Spinach Cashew Alfredo sauce that is so cheesy, rich and creamy! A gluten-free, grain-free and dairy-free comfort food recipe that is big in flavor! Allergen Information: Dairy-free, egg-free, soy-free, yeast-free, corn-free, gluten-free, grain-free, refined Oil-free
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup baby spinach (raw or blanched, or other blanched greens or omit)
1  garlic clove or 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder

itemListElement.text: Blend all the ingredients of the Alfredo. Taste and adjust salt.
itemListElement.name: Blend all the ingredients of the Alfredo. Taste and adjust salt.

itemListElement.text: The sauce thickens during baking so I did not cook it. You can nuke it in the microwave to thicken it a bit.
itemListElement.name: The sauce thickens during baking so I did not cook it. You can nuke it in the microwave to thicken it a bit.

itemListElement.text: Grease the ramekin if you plan to remove the bake.
itemListElement.name: Grease the ramekin if you plan to remove the bake.

itemListElement.text: Add a little alfredo in the ramekin. top with sliced Sweet Potatoes, overlapping so it is a continuous layer.
itemListElement.name: Add a little alfredo in the ramekin. top with sliced Sweet Potatoes, overlapping so it is a continuous layer.

itemListElement.text: Top with mini peppers, tomato slices, radish, and drizzle enough alfredo to cover.
itemListElement.name: Top with mini peppers, tomato slices, radish, and drizzle enough alfredo to cover.

itemListElement.text: If using a larger ramekin, add other veggies/mushrooms and sauce layer.
itemListElement.name: If using a larger ramekin, add other veggies/mushrooms and sauce layer.

itemListElement.text: Top with Sweet potatoes, tomato slices, more alfredo.
itemListElement.name: Top with Sweet potatoes, tomato slices, more alfredo.

itemListElement.text: For the final layer, you can use breadcrumbs mixed with dried herbs(I used italian blend) and salt.
itemListElement.name: For the final layer, you can use breadcrumbs mixed with dried herbs(I used italian blend) and salt.

itemListElement.text: Or sweet potato slices brushed with olive oil for a crunchy sweet potato top. Sprinkle some herbs and salt on top.
itemListElement.name: Or sweet potato slices brushed with olive oil for a crunchy sweet potato top. Sprinkle some herbs and salt on top.

itemListElement.text: Serve as is warm in the ramekin. Let sit for 5-10 minutes before removing from ramekin.
itemListElement.name: Serve as is warm in the ramekin. Let sit for 5-10 minutes before removing from ramekin.

keywords: cashew cheese sauce, sweet potato bake, vegan alfredo bake
